section.title: Element: Primitive
section.simpara: The Primitive element is a single built-in primitive function or operator. It has no body contents.

formalpara.title: Primitive contents
formalpara.para: No contents are given for this element.

formalpara.title: Primitive attributes
formalpara.para:
The name attribute contains the literal value of the primitive. The class indicates the type of primitive that it is, taken directly from the Function Specification. These can be one of the following:
operator monadic dyadic . Either axis or selective may be added as additional tags to indicate their class in either of these cases.
